section.title: Description
section.p: DROP GROUP is an obsolete command, though still accepted for backwards compatibility. Groups (and users) have been superseded by the more general concept of roles. See for more information.

plentry.pd: Do not throw an error if the role does not exist. A notice is issued in this case.
The name of an existing role.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: There is no DROP GROUP statement in the SQL standard.
